bjhong02 writes:
> I downloaded the binary of Heritrix 1.0.0, and tried to test it with
> the  seed: www.uiuc.edu. It succeed in dns lookup, but failed to read
> robots.txt (really exist).  The error log is as follows.

Well, the error says that the read timed out --- can you get the
robots.txt file from your browser or from wget?

> My another questioin is, how about if there's no robots.txt? it seems,
> in the normal setting, if there's no robots.txt for a server, the html
> pages on it will not be crawled. 

No. If there is no robots.txt then it is assumed that the server's
administration has no objections to being crawled, so everything is
fair game.
